story.text: I have developed my own [[Wiki Wiki]] clone called [[Pikie Pikie]], written in Python, and based on [[Piki Piki]].

You can find the current status of this project at [http://pikie.dyndns.org/ pikie.dyndns.org], and the latest version is available for download from [http://pikie.dyndns.org/cgi/pikie.py?DownloadPage pikie.dyndns.org].
I can also be reached at mailto:steve.pike@oztourer.nl
